column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////The customer service ambiance and drinks weregreat which is why I give 3 stars but both my boyfriend and I were disappointed by this ramen experience. We ordered the Chicken and Spicy Chicken Ramens. The broth was super salty
column2: the chicken texture was not great (seemed processed) and the add ons were not fresh. Our quest for fresh and yummy ramen continues ‚Äç I would only recommend Jinya as a happy hour spot post-Covid
